workshoptitle: The Title of the Workshop is Defined in the Manifest File

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision an Instance
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Basic OCI Security
tutorials.description: Create and manage encryption keys within a customer-managed key vault.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Cloud Guard Manual Remediation
tutorials.description: Configure manual remediation for detected security risks.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Cloud Guard Auto Remediation
tutorials.description: Automate responses to detected security vulnerabilities.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Cloud Guard Notification Setup
tutorials.description: Set up notifications to monitor and alert on security-related events.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Data Safe Assess Database Configurations
tutorials.description: Initial setup of Oracle Data Safe, including registration of an Autonomous Database. Use Oracle Data Safe to assess database configurations for compliance.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Data Safe Assess Database Users
tutorials.description: Review and analyze database user accounts with Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Data Safe Audit Database Activity
tutorials.description: Monitor and audit database activity for enhanced security visibility.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Data Safe Generate Alerts
tutorials.description: Configure and generate alerts based on Oracle Data Safe findings.

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Data Safe Discover Sensitive Data
tutorials.description: Identify and classify sensitive data within the database using Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Data Safe SQL Firewall
tutorials.description: Implement SQL Firewall to manage and restrict SQL execution within the database.

tutorials.title: Lab 12: Security Zones
tutorials.description: Configure Security Zones to enforce compliance and security policies.

tutorials.title: Lab 13: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
tutorials.description: Set up and test the Web Application Firewall to protect applications from threats.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
